summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pure Equity Trust platform. All backend APIs and frontend pages are working correctly. Authentication, CRUD operations, PDF generation, and UI interactions all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint
Backend root endpoint
Templates endpoint returns 4 trust document templates
Protected endpoints return 401 without authentication
User authentication and session management
GET /api/auth/me returns user data with valid session
GET /api/trusts returns empty array for new user
POST /api/trusts creates new trust document
GET /api/trusts/:id returns specific trust document
PUT /api/trusts/:id updates trust document
GET /api/trusts/:id/pdf generates and downloads PDF
DELETE /api/trusts/:id deletes document
Landing page loads with hero, features, trust types, and maxims sections
Education page loads with trust roles, maxims accordion, and document types
Login page loads with Google OAuth button
Dashboard page loads with valid auth session and shows empty state
Create Trust page loads and shows 4 templates with form functionality
Edit Trust page loads and shows all form fields with data binding
All navigation elements and buttons are clickable
Form inputs accept data and validation works
Authentication flow works correctly with session cookies
